BCDummy

class pyrit.bdrycond.BCDummy(value: Union[Callable[[Any], Union[ndarray, float]], ndarray, float], name: str = '')

Bases: BC

Class of a dummy boundary condition object.

id

Unique identifier for each object

Type

int

name

A name for the boundary condition

Type

str

regi

ID of the region in which the boundary is created

Type

int

idxoffset

Offset regarding the degrees of freedom in the solution vector

Type

double

data

Boundary data (constant part)

Type

complex double vector

timefun

Boundary data (part depending on time)

Type

function handle

currentval

Current value of the boundary data

Type

double vector

Constructor of class BCDummy.

Parameters

  • value (Union[Callable[[Any], Union[ndarray, float]], ndarray, float]) – The value of the BC. A function or a constant

  • name (str) – A name for the boundary condition

Methods

compute_args

Compute the lists of arguments for a given value.

update

Updates the arguments of the value, if possible.

Attributes

positional_args

keyword_args

ID

The unique ID of the BC

inverse_value

The inverse value

is_constant

Returns True if the value is constant, i.e. linear, homogeneous and not time dependent.

is_homogeneous

Returns True if the value is homogeneous and False if not

is_linear

Returns True if the value is linear and False if not

is_time_dependent

Returns True if the value is time dependent and False if not

value

The value.

The unique ID of the BC

property is_constant: bool

Returns True if the value is constant, i.e. linear, homogeneous and not time dependent

Returns

constant

Return type

bool

property is_homogeneous: bool

Returns True if the value is homogeneous and False if not

Returns

True: value is homogeneous. False: value is not homogeneous.

Return type

bool

property is_linear: bool

Returns True if the value is linear and False if not

Returns

True: value is linear. False: value is not linear.

Return type

bool

property is_time_dependent: bool

Returns True if the value is time dependent and False if not

Returns

True: value is time dependent. False: value is not time dependent.

Return type

bool

update(name: str, val: Any)

Updates the arguments of the value, if possible.

Parameters

  • name (str) – The name of the argument of value to update

  • val (Any) – The new value
